  • Constructor Details

    • Car

      public Car(String brand, String model, int year, double hourlyRentalCost, double dailyRentalCost, int numDoors, int numberOfSeats, String fuelType, double fuelTankCapacity, boolean isConvertible)
      Constructs a Car object with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      brand - the brand of the car
      model - the model of the car
      year - the year of the car
      hourlyRentalCost - the hourly rental cost of the car
      dailyRentalCost - the daily rental cost of the car
      numDoors - the number of doors of the car
      numberOfSeats - the number of seats in the car
      fuelType - the fuel type of the car
      fuelTankCapacity - the fuel tank capacity of the car
      isConvertible - true if the car is convertible, false otherwise
